summary: TRANSMISSION FAILURE :  2001 ACURA CL TYPE S  TRAVELING 50 MPH ON  US6 TRANSMISSION DOWN SHIFTED ABRUPTLY AND MADE ME SWERVE OUT OF TRAFFIC  NEXT DAY TRANSMISSION TOTALLY DIED AND WAS REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY  THE SECOND TRANSMISSION IS GIVING SIGNS OF THE SAME PROBLEM  DEC 2001 FIRST TRANSMISSION REPLACED  JAN 2003 SECOND TRANSMISSION CHECKED AND FLUID IS BURNED PLUS TRANSMISSION IS ON ITS WAY OUT, I AM AFRAID MY VEHICLE IS UNSAFE TO DRIVE.  *JB
